page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT APPLETON WISKE
page.content: Appleton and Hornby is prosperous having less than 2% unemployment.From 148 survey replies, 31 jobs were listed in 5 categories.Manufacturing employed 31, Farming 20,service industries 64,National/Local Govt 11 Education 7.Apart from farming only 12 worked in manual occupations,3 skilled factory workers,7 builders and 2 labourers.9 people ran their own buisnesses,Chemical,construction and marine engineers,architects, accountants,designers,managers company directors,scientific and social reseachers,sales representatives and hair dressers make up the other occupations.Most people work in the area bounded by Peterlee,Richmond, Northallerton and Redcar.3 worked on North Sea Oil Rigs,1 in Spain and 2 wherever their company sends them.In 1/3 of families both parents work.
